issue.title: The definition of move-constructor is redundant

discussion.p: This definition of move-constructor is redundant and confusing now that the term constructor is defined by the core language in subclause 12.8p3.

blockquote.p: Accepting n3142 provides a superior resolution.

discussion.note: 2010 Batavia: resolved as NAD Editorial by adopting paper n3142.
discussion.p: Original proposed resolution preserved for reference:

p.del:
17.3.14 [defns.move.ctor]
move constructor a constructor which accepts only an rvalue argument of the type being constructed and might modify the argument as a side effect during construction.
